"I don't want what she's got planned to work, it'd take away our 
excuse to frag that creation of a garbagebot." he looked toward 
Ramulus," Good that makes three guns to attack with."

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Shadow Wing::
> 
> She turned and looked at Ramulus.
> "I don't know, but I hope what ever she is planning works."
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> > ::Ramulus::
> > 
> > The bushes rustle as Ramulus walks into the clearing, stopping 
near 
> Lunarpine 
> > and Shadow Wing, his gun ready to fire on a newcomer. His eyes 
> narrow as he 
> > sees Ramhorn being held up by Unitron and Shuko, then widen as he 
> hears 
> > another bot screaming at Unitron.
> > 
> > "What's she doing?" he says to Lunarpine and Shadow Wing, "Is she 
> insane?!"
